0.title: Academic Courses Comittee, Student Organization Online

NavDrawer.contribute: Interested in learning how the website is put together?

sections.title: Who I Am
sections.content: I am a 20 year old Informatics student at NTNU, and i'm in the 2nd year of my bachelor's degree. I am a member of the Academic Courses Comittee at the Student Organization Online, where I am the deputy head for the school year 24/25.

sections.title: My Skills
sections.content: I designed this website in React with TypeScript, leveraging frameworks like Next.js for server-side rendering and SEO benefits. My toolset includes Material UI for designing responsive and theme-consistent UIs, along with a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Additionally, I have experience with Java and Python, and have worked on projects in both languages. I am always looking to expand my skillset and learn new technologies.

sections.title: My Journey
sections.content: I started my journey in informatics in 2020, when I took some introductory programming classes in High School. After that, I started my Bachelor of Informatics at NTNU Trondheim and have since then learned a lot about programming, web development, and software engineering. I have worked on several projects, both alone and in groups, and have gained a lot of experience in the field.

sections.title: My Goals
sections.content: My goal is to become a full-stack developer. I want to work on projects that make a difference, and that can help people in their everyday lives. I am passionate about technology, and I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow.

projects.title: Website built with React, TypeScript, Next.js, and Material UI
projects.description: This project is actually this website! It was built with React, TypeScript, Next.js, and Material UI. It is a responsive and theme-consistent website that showcases my skills, experience, and projects. It is designed to be easy to navigate and visually appealing. I built this website to showcase my work and to provide information about myself to potential employers and collaborators. If you have any feedback or suggestions, feel free to reach out to me! ðŸ˜Š
